BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO EST_QUATER_ALLOTMENT_DTL (NUM_HOSPITAL_ID,NUM_BUILDING_CODE,GNUM_SLNO_B,NUM_BLOCK_TYPE_ID,NUM_BLOCK_ID,GNUM_SLNO_BLK,NUM_FLOOR_ID,GNUM_SLNO_F,NUM_QUARTER_ID,GNUM_SLNO_QTR,NUM_QUARTER_TYPE_ID,GNUM_SLNO_QTY,STR_ALLOTTE_CATEGORY,STR_EMPLOYEE_CODE,NUM_ALLOTTE_REF_NO,DT_DATE_OF_ALLOTMENT,NUM_LICENSE_FEE,NUM_IF_EXEMPTED,STR_SANCTION_ORDER_NO,DT_SANCTION_ORDER_DATE,STR_SANCTION_REMARKS,NUM_ELECTRICITY_AMOUNT,NUM_WATER_AMOUNT,DT_POSSESSION_DATE,DT_MAX_POSSESSION_DATE,GDT_EFFECT_DATE,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GNUM_ISVALID,GBL_NUM_SEAT_ID,STR_STATUS,NUM_APPLICATION_ID) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE EST_QUATER_MST A SET A.STR_STATUS_FLAG='B' WHERE A.NUM_QUARTER_ID=?
UPDATE EST_REQ_APPLICATION_FORM_DTL A SET A.GNUM_ISVALID=2 WHERE A.NUM_APPLICATION_ID=?

UPDATE EST_QUATER_ALLOTMENT_DTL SET DT_DATE_OF_ALLOTMENT=?,NUM_LICENSE_FEE=?,NUM_IF_EXEMPTED=?, STR_SANCTION_ORDER_NO=?,DT_SANCTION_ORDER_DATE=?,STR_SANCTION_REMARKS=?,NUM_ELECTRICITY_AMOUNT=?,NUM_WATER_AMOUNT=?,DT_POSSESSION_DATE=?,DT_MAX_POSSESSION_DATE=?, STR_POS_AFTER_RET=?,NUM_REV_LICENSE_FEE=?, DT_APP_LIC_FEE=?, STR_RES_REV_LINCE_FEE=?, DT_POS_START_RET_DATE=?,DT_POS_END_RET_DATE=?,STR_ACCEPT_FLAGE=?, DT_ACCEPT_DATE=?, GDT_EFFECT_DATE=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE NUM_ALLOTTE_REF_NO=?
UPDATE EST_QUATER_MST A SET A.STR_STATUS_FLAG='A' WHERE A.NUM_QUARTER_ID=?
DELETE FROM EST_QTR_ALLOT_ELEC_METER_DTL A WHERE NUM_ALLOTTE_REF_NO=?
DELETE FROM EST_QTR_ALLOT_WATER_METER_DTL A WHERE NUM_ALLOTTE_REF_NO=?
UPDATE EST_QUATER_ALLOTMENT_DTL A SET A.GNUM_ISVALID=0,A.STR_STATUS='V' WHERE A.NUM_ALLOTTE_REF_NO=?
UPDATE EST_QTR_ALLOT_ELEC_METER_DTL A SET A.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE A.NUM_ALLOTTE_REF_NO=?
UPDATE EST_QTR_ALLOT_WATER_METER_DTL A SET A.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE A.NUM_ALLOTTE_REF_NO=?
UPDATE EST_QUATER_MST A SET A.STR_STATUS_FLAG='N' WHERE A.NUM_QUARTER_ID=?

INSERT INTO EST_QTR_ITEMCROSSCHECK_DTL (NUM_ALLOTTE_REF_NO,DT_CROSSCHECKED_DATE,STR_ITEM_CATEGORY_NAME,STR_ITEM_NAME,NUM_ITEM_ID,STR_CHECK_LIST_STATUS,STR_CHECK_LIST_DESC,STR_ACCEPTANCE,DT_EFFECT_DATE,DT_ENTRY_DATE,NUM_IS_VALID,GBL_NUM_SEAT_ID) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

INSERT INTO EST_QTR_ALLOT_ELEC_METER_DTL (NUM_ALLOTTE_REF_NO,STR_METER_BY,STR_METER_NUMBER,DT_DATE_OF_INSTALLATION,DT_DATE_OF_REMOVAL,STR_DESCRIPTION,GDT_EFFECT_DATE,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GNUM_ISVALID,GBL_NUM_SEAT_ID) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

INSERT INTO EST_QTR_ALLOT_WATER_METER_DTL (NUM_ALLOTTE_REF_NO,STR_METER_BY,STR_METER_NUMBER,DT_DATE_OF_INSTALLATION,DT_DATE_OF_REMOVAL,STR_DESCRIPTION,GDT_EFFECT_DATE,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GNUM_ISVALID,GBL_NUM_SEAT_ID) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
DELETE FROM EST_QTR_ITEMCROSSCHECK_DTL A WHERE A.NUM_ALLOTTE_REF_NO=?
UPDATE EST_QUATER_ALLOTMENT_DTL SET STR_OFFER_LETTER_NO =? , DT_OFFER_LETTER=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE NUM_ALLOTTE_REF_NO=?
UPDATE EST_QUATER_ALLOTMENT_DTL SET STR_ACCEPT_FLAGE=? , DT_ACCEPT_DATE=?,DT_POSSESSION_DATE=?,DT_EXPECT_VACATION=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE NUM_ALLOTTE_REF_NO=?
UPDATE EST_QUATER_ALLOTMENT_DTL SET STR_ACCEPT_FLAGE=? , DT_ACCEPT_DATE=?,DT_POSSESSION_DATE=?,DT_EXPECT_VACATION=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE NUM_ALLOTTE_REF_NO=?

UPDATE EST_REQ_APPLICATION_FORM_DTL A SET A.STR_FINAL_ACEP_REJ_NEX='N',A.GNUM_ISVALID=1 ,A.STR_AUTO_PRIORITY='', A.STR_MANUAL_PRIORITY='',GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=? , GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE A.NUM_APPLICATION_ID=?
UPDATE EST_QUATER_ALLOTMENT_DTL SET STR_ALLOT_LETTER_NO=?, DT_ALLOT_LETTER=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE NUM_ALLOTTE_REF_NO=?
